item.title: Kim Kardashian Failed Bar Exam After Psychics PROMISED She’d Pass
item.description: But at least her company's worth $1 billion more now than it was.

item.title: Mind The Gap: Why In-House Counsel Often Don’t See The Innovation They Want From Law Firms
item.description: Perhaps it’s time for in-house legal to have a gut check with their outside counsel.

item.title: Kering and Mayhoola to Inject €100 Million Into Valentino
item.description: The fashion house breached its loan covenants earlier this year.

item.title: Authentic Brands Group in Talks to Acquire Missoni
item.description: A deal could come by the end of the year.

item.title: Opening Bell: 11.12.25
item.description: So much for free speech and shareholder democracy; Trump “knew about the girls”; rate cut indecision; Paul Singer’s not-quite-mea-culpa; and more!
